description: Burgundy: For the Hopeless Romantic. Write with elegance and charm and adorn your life with a splash of this luxurious sheen. Made from Mahogany wood.
Forest: For the nature-loving.Crafted from maple wood, the wood is taken raw and lacquered with beeswax, embodying an organic and natural look.
With a blank slate, this ash wooden pen ridden with intricacies will be accompanying you in filling that up.
Less is more, an admirable life motto, and certainly what Minimalistic is sticking to. Made from Maple wood.

Coral is the pen meant for those with a vibrant and bubbly disposition! Taking it easy with life yet excited for everything that is coming their way, this pen will accompany you through your adventures.
